short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant insights into available seats and their prices, with color-coding and ticket type filtering.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances your ability to spot price breaks using color-coded visualization.
Get instant insights into available seats and their prices for Ticketmaster and LiveNation shows with our extension, which color-codes seats for easy price comparison and can also filter by ticket type
